id: Perth man charged over gas incident
paragraph:
By

Australian Associated Press

Published:
  19:49 EST, 30 October 2018

 | 
Updated:
  19:49 EST, 30 October 2018

A 45-year-old Perth man has been charged with endangering the lives of people in a block of units after releasing gas in a stairwell and threatening to set it alight.Police say the man opened a gas canister and sprayed the gas around the bottom of the stairwell of the Burswood units on Monday.It is also alleged he held a lighter in his hand and threatened to set the gas alight.Residents barricaded themselves upstairs inside the complex before the man fled.Two people were later taken to hospital as a precaution after feeling unwell.The man was arrested on Tuesday and will appear in Perth Magistrates Court on Wednesday.Sorry we are not currently accepting comments on this article.Published by Associated Newspapers LtdPart of the Daily Mail, The Mail on Sunday & Metro Media Group
